• I can use the command line for every day tasks (moving and deleting files, changing directories) {1}
  • I am used to working independently and managing my own tasks {1}
  • I have heard of agile project management before {2}
  • I have done pair-programming in the past {2}
  • I have gotten used to refactoring code {3}

some more ideas not so sure about the 'rating' though, it's tricky!
